inlineContent.text: Welcome to the Ultimate Network Debugging Tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn a variety of techniques to debug network-related issues in your app. To get started, you’ll first download a sample project from GitHub that will serve as a practical example for applying the concepts covered in this tutorial.

Once you have the sample project, you’ll download either Proxyman or Charles, powerful tools for network debugging. After installing the necessary certificates on your iOS or Android device, you’ll be well-prepared to dive into the world of network debugging and enhance your skills in identifying and resolving network-related issues in your app.
In the first section of the Network Debugging Tutorial, you will download a sample project from GitHub to use as a starting point for the tutorial.
This project provides a practical example of how to apply the concepts you’ll learn in this tutorial.
Step-by-step guide to downloading the sample project from GitHub:
Visit the GitHub repository containing the sample project. The URL might look something like this:
On the main page of the repository, locate the green “Code” button on the right side.
Click on this button to reveal a dropdown menu with several download options.
You can either clone the repository using a Git client or download the project as a ZIP file:
To clone the repository, copy the URL provided in the “Clone” section of the dropdown menu like this:
Then, open Terminal on your Mac and run the following command, replacing URL with the copied URL:
To download the project as a ZIP file, click the “Download ZIP” option in the dropdown menu.
Once the download is complete, locate the ZIP file in your Downloads folder and extract its contents.
Or skip this step and open Android folder in next step
and open the .xcodeproj file with Xcode to get started with the tutorial.
Now you have the sample project from GitHub, and you can proceed with the next
Navigate to the Android folder and Open it in Android studio to get started with the tutorial.
Now you have the sample project from GitHub, and you can proceed with the next
In the secodn section of the Network Debugging Tutorial, you will download the Proxyman
Charles which is a tool for this tutorial.

abstract.text: Welcome to the App Inspection tutorial! In this brief yet informative guide, you’ll learn how to track all network traffic on your device and inspect the details of requests and responses going through www.swapi.dev. Get ready to enhance your network debugging capabilities by mastering the art of app inspection with powerful tools like Proxyman and Charles.

Welcome to the Ultimate Network Debugging Tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn a variety of techniques to debug network-related issues in your app. To get started, you’ll first download a sample project from GitHub that will serve as a practical example for applying the concepts covered in this tutorial.

Welcome to the Advanced Usage tutorial, where you’ll learn how to master this powerful tool to take your network debugging skills to the next level! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll discover how to save, import, and export requests and responses, map local responses, simulate various network conditions, manage block/allow lists, and explore extra features exclusive to certain network debugging tools. Get ready to become a network debugging expert and make your app development process even more efficient.

Welcome to the Advanced Usage tutorial, where you’ll learn how to master this powerful tool to take your network debugging skills to the next level! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll discover how to save, import, and export requests and responses, map local responses, simulate various network conditions, manage block/allow lists, and explore extra features exclusive to certain network debugging tools. Get ready to become a network debugging expert and make your app development process even more efficient.
Welcome to the Ultimate Network Debugging Tutorial!

doc://com.raywenderlich.StarCharles/tuto.title: Avoid MITM by using SSL Pinning

abstract.text: Welcome to the Man In The Middle Attack tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn about the importance of using SSL Pinning to avoid man-in-the-middle (MITM) attacks and protect your app’s communication.

Welcome to the Ultimate Network Debugging Tutorial! In this tutorial, you’ll learn a variety of techniques to debug network-related issues in your app. To get started, you’ll first download a sample project from GitHub that will serve as a practical example for applying the concepts covered in this tutorial.

Welcome to the Basic Proxying tutorial! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll learn how to inspect your app in greater detail and effectively collaborate with back-end developers by sending cURL requests and responses. You’ll also discover how to map network traffic, use breakpoints to manipulate data on-the-fly, and leverage the Repeat tool to resend requests without client involvement. Prepare to dive deep into the world of network debugging and enhance your skills in proxying and app inspection.

Welcome to the Advanced Usage tutorial, where you’ll learn how to master this powerful tool to take your network debugging skills to the next level! In this comprehensive guide, you’ll discover how to save, import, and export requests and responses, map local responses, simulate various network conditions, manage block/allow lists, and explore extra features exclusive to certain network debugging tools. Get ready to become a network debugging expert and make your app development process even more efficient.
